channel.title: CVE Feed for AVEVA -- InTouch Access Anywhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVEVA -- InTouch Access Anywhere

item.title: CVE-2022-23854|2024-08-03T03:51:46.138Z -- aveva -- intouch%20access%20anywhere
item.description: AVEVA InTouch Access Anywhere versions 2020 R2 and older are vulnerable to a path traversal exploit that could allow an unauthenticated user with network access to read files on the system outside of the secure gateway web server.
